name: Enchanted Mango
description: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

abilities.name: Eat Mango
abilities.description: Consumes the mango and instantly mana restores.
notes: Has the following targeting functionalities: Self-mana restores upon activation, even while the wielder is invulnerable
Requires Ctrl to target an allied hero
Considers clones, illusions, and creep-heroes as heroes
Neither requires turning nor facing the targeted unit to cast, as long it is within the cast range
Can be cast on untargetable units indirectly via portrait-casting
Enchanted Mangoes on the ground have a greater pick-up range compared to other items

additionalInfo: The health regeneration bonus from multiple instances fully stacks
Enchanted Mangoes dug up with Trusty Shovel are fully shareable, but cannot be sold
